Sentencas: Thin films from the Lan+1NinO3n+1 system exhibit favorable dielectric and electrochemical properties that may prove useful for a variety of devices ranging from ferroelectrics to low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Lanthanum nickelate thin films deposited by spray pyrolysis: Crystallization, microstructure and electrochemical properties

Sentencas: The present work covers the compositional, microstructural and electrochemical characterization of thin lanthanum nickelate films deposited by spray pyrolysis.
Titulo: Lanthanum nickelate thin films deposited by spray pyrolysis: Crystallization, microstructure and electrochemical properties

Sentencas: In accordance with the phase diagram, LaNiO3-delta or La4Ni3O10-delta films were obtained during annealing of spray deposited films at temperatures between 540 degrees C and 1100 degrees C.
Titulo: Lanthanum nickelate thin films deposited by spray pyrolysis: Crystallization, microstructure and electrochemical properties

Sentencas: Whereas LaNiO3-delta films exhibited a high metallic conductivity, La4Ni3O10-delta films were semiconducting.
Titulo: Lanthanum nickelate thin films deposited by spray pyrolysis: Crystallization, microstructure and electrochemical properties

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy indicated an increase of the area specific oxygen reduction resistance with the annealing temperature.
Titulo: Lanthanum nickelate thin films deposited by spray pyrolysis: Crystallization, microstructure and electrochemical properties

Sentencas: The study highlights how the phase and microstructure of thin films from the Lan+1NinO3n+1 system can be tailored by annealing of initially amorphous films.
Titulo: Lanthanum nickelate thin films deposited by spray pyrolysis: Crystallization, microstructure and electrochemical properties

Sentencas: LaNiO3-delta films have a high potential for application in electrochemical devices operating at low temperatures where high electrical conductivity is required.
Titulo: Lanthanum nickelate thin films deposited by spray pyrolysis: Crystallization, microstructure and electrochemical properties
